Affix.Name: Unfinished Reverie
Affix.Desc: After leaving combat for 3s, DMG dealt increased by 50%. In combat, if no Burning opponents are nearby for more than 6s, this DMG Bonus will decrease by 10% per second until it reaches 0%. When a Burning opponent exists, it will increase by 10% instead until it reaches 50%. This effect still triggers if the equipping character is off-field.

EQUIP_RING.Name: The Wine-Flask Over Which the Plan Was Hatched
EQUIP_RING.Desc: A three-legged cup. Once, many heroes were gathered around the bonfire, raising their cups high in toast and drinking their fill while discussing their wishes and ambitions.

EQUIP_NECKLACE.Name: Faded Emerald Tail
EQUIP_NECKLACE.Desc: A tail feather ornament whose luster has long faded. The patterns on it are said to have been etched by the hand of a skilled artisan from long ago.

EQUIP_DRESS.Name: Crownless Crown
EQUIP_DRESS.Desc: A golden crown decorated with turquoise and emerald feathers, it has never been used in a coronation, living alone atop a velvet cushion.

EQUIP_BRACER.Name: Dark Fruit of Bright Flowers
EQUIP_BRACER.Desc: A flower carved from grey stone covered with gold foil. Legends say that during a war, it was used to differentiate friend from foe.

EQUIP_SHOES.Name: Moment of Attainment
EQUIP_SHOES.Desc: A sundial used by an ancient kingdom to tell time. Tiny marks have been left at a certain scale that can only be seen through careful observation.
